>

Fetch coupon codes

<Heading
  id={"request"}

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"x-api-key","in":"header","schema":{"type":"string"},"description":"API key for identification","example":"{{api_key}}"},{"name":"authorization","in":"header","schema":{"type":"string"},"description":"JWT access token","example":"{{access_token}}"},{"name":"x-api-version","in":"header","schema":{"type":"string"},"description":"API version","example":"{{version}}"},{"name":"x-organization-id","in":"header","schema":{"type":"string"},"description":"Organization id","example":"{{organization_id}}"},{"name":"status","in":"query","schema":{"type":"string"},"description":"Optional filter to get coupon codes by specified status","example":"inactive"},{"name":"visibility","in":"query","schema":{"type":"string"},"description":"Optional filter to get coupon codes as per specified visibility","example":"private"},{"name":"external_id","in":"query","schema":{"type":"string"},"description":"Option filter to get customer specific coupon codes","example":"customer@gmail.com"},{"name":"duration_type","in":"query","schema":{"type":"string"},"description":"Optional filter to get coupon codes by specified duration type","example":"recurring"},{"name":"take","in":"query","schema":{"type":"integer"},"description":"Optional page size. Default is 10","example":"10"},{"name":"skip","in":"query","schema":{"type":"integer"},"description":"Optional page offset. Default is 0","example":"0"},{"name":"coupon_id","in":"path","schema":{"type":"string"},"required":true,"description":"Coupon id","example":"56da8763-0a95-47ec-92f5-d8a2446d8a9c"},{"name":"campaign_id","in":"path","schema":{"type":"string"},"required":true,"description":"Coupon set id","example":"6e67d7cb-4fe0-4209-afe6-02ce07b5875a"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>
